entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Drayton Valley
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain showers beginning late this evening then changing to flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
